00067 
00068 inline G4bool 
00069 BDSAcceleration::IsApplicable(const G4ParticleDefinition& particle)
00070 {
00071   return(  (&particle == G4Electron::Electron())
00072            ||(&particle == G4Positron::Positron()) );
00073 }
00074 
00075 inline G4double 
00076 BDSAcceleration::GetMeanFreePath(const G4Track& track,
00077                                         G4double PreviousStepSize,
00078                                         G4ForceCondition* ForceCondition)
00079 {  
00080   *ForceCondition = NotForced ;
00081   G4double MeanFreePath=10.*m;
00082 
00083   return MeanFreePath;
00084 }
